Company name: Office of the Commandant Home Guards, Keonjhar
Qualifications required: The applicant should be a citizen of India.
The applicant should be a permanent resident of Keonjhar District.
The applicant should have passed Lower Primary (Class-5th) Examination.
The applicant should be able to read, write and speak in Odiya language.
The applicant should be sound health, physique and free from any organic defect/Chronic diseases with high BMI or body infirmity and no physical deformity.
The applicant should be of good moral character & he/she should not be facing trial in a criminal case or convicted for any criminal offence.
Skills required: Preference will be given to candidates with specific skills in Computer, Driving, Cooking, Electrician, Plumber, Barber, Cobbler, Carpenter, Tailor, AC mechanic, and other trades etc.
Age limit: Not less than 20 years or not more than 60 years as on 01.01.2025.
Salary or compensation details: not mentioned (Service is purely voluntary, tenure is 3 years)
Mode of application: Offline. Submit prescribed application form (Form-"A" of Odisha Home Guards Rules, 1962) directly at District Home Guard Office at RO, Keonjhar. Application forms are available at all the Police Stations and Office of the Commandant, Home Guards Keonjhar (at RO. Keonjhar). Application submission period is from 21.05.2025 10:00 AM to 31.05.2025 5:00 PM.
Contact details: Office of the Commandant Home Guards, Keonjhar. (Applications to be submitted at District Home Guard Office at RO, Keonjhar)
